name: In the High One's Halls
description:
In the High One's Halls is a role-playing game for solo or group play.  In it you take on the role of being living in the mythos of Scandinavia.  This RPG uses the Hávamál to provide the narrative flavor for the events and trials you will face!

The product contains all the necessary rules to play:

  • The rules for ITHOH
  • A character sheet
  • An Excel-based Player's Kit
  • An online generator for drawing passages from the Hávamál
  • A plaintext version for those who use screen readers
  • A chart of random numbers for offline play
